welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lancaster! This charming city is known for its historic landmarks, scenic countryside, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and soak up all that Lancaster has to offer during your stay. Enjoy! "

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Walney Island Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Walney Island Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
